welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bakhtawarpur, India! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich history and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bakhtawarpur has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Delhi Hindon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and most modern terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 30 minutes. After that, users can purchase additional time.
